question.text:
Select the correct combination of the statements (A-D) regarding the characteristics of certain organisms.
A. Methanogens are Archaebacteria, which produce methane in marshy areas.
B. Nostoc is a filamentous blue-green algae, which fixes atmospheric nitrogen.
C. Chemosynthetic autotrophic bacteria synthesize cellulose from glucose.
D. Mycoplasma lack a cell wall and can survive without oxygen.

solution.text:
Methanogens are archaebacteria, which produce methane in marshy areas.
Nostoc is a blue-green alga, which fixes atmospheric nitrogen.
Chemosynthetic autotrophs oxidize inorganic substances to produce energy and help in the cycling of minerals.
Mycoplasmas are a group of eubacteria that lack a rigid cell wall and can survive without oxygen.
